010package imagingbook.common.util;
011
012/**
013 * This class defines static methods related to enum types.
014 * @author WB
015 *
016 */
017public abstract class EnumUtils {
018
019        private EnumUtils() {}
020        
021        /**
022         * Returns an array of all constant names (strings) 
023         * for the given enumeration class. 
024         * Names are arranged in the same order as the enum constant definitions.
025         * Assume the enum definition: 
026         * <pre>enum MyEnum {A, B, C};</pre>
027         * Usage: 
028         * <pre>String[] names = getEnumNames(MyEnum.class);</pre>
029         * This returns the array 
030         * <pre>{"A", "B", "C"}</pre>
031         * 
032         * @param <E> the generic enum type
033         * @param enumclass enumeration class
034         * @return array (possibly empty) of names defined for the specified enumeration class
035         */
036        public static <E extends Enum<E>> String[] getEnumNames(Class<E> enumclass) {
037                E[] eConstants = enumclass.getEnumConstants();
038                String[] eNames = new String[eConstants.length];
039                for (int i = 0; i < eConstants.length; i++) {
040                        eNames[i] = eConstants[i].name();
041                }
042                return eNames;
043        }
044        
045}
